entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
